en: You must be new around here, yes?
jp: Anata wa kono chiiki ni kita no ga hajimetedesu yo ne?

en: Well, welcome to the neighborhood friend!
jp: Sate, watashitachi no kinjo e yōkoso, yūjin yo!

en: No? Must be getting forgetful. Good to see you then!
jp: Iya? Wasureppoku natte kita. Demo, aete ureshī yo!
Pōshon o tanoshinde kudasai, ogorimasu yo!
Pōshon o tanoshinde kudasai, ogorimasu yo!
CSV inpōto o tesuto shite imasu!

en: Don't forget to equip new gear!
jp: Atarashī sōbi o wasurezu ni sōbi shite kudasai!
